title: EmuDeck Store
description:
Now you can browse and download games from our homebrew collection one by one.
On this release they are only playable on EmulationStation DE

title: UI / UX tweaks
description:
- New Confirmation ( Custom Mode ) & Post Install Status page
- New home screen after first install
- RetroAchievements for PS1 and PS2

title: New Emulators
description:
- MelonDS Standalone ( Custom Mode )
- Rosalie's Mupen GUI ( Custom Mode )
- mGBA ( Custom Mode )
- Cemu AppImage ( On Manage Emulators )
- Pico8 and tic80 RetroArch Cores

title: Manage Emulators
description: Get notifications when an emulator has a new configuration update so you don't need to reinstall EmuDeck to apply that specific configuration.

title: Migrate Installation
description: Move your EmuDeck Installation to another destination: SD Card, Internal Storage, etc.

title: Dolphin Configuration update
description:
- Keep window on top false
-WSHack off by default
-Vsync = ON
-Gamecube controllers standardized using the profile.
-Unlock FPS changed to Start + R2
-Increase Emu Speed = Select + R2
-Decrease Emu Speed = Select + L2

title: Cloud Services Manager
description: Create shortcuts on Steam for cloud services like Apple TV, Disney +, Hulu, Plex but also streaming services like Moonlight or Chiaki

title: Bug fixes & Small Features
description:
- Fixed PS3 Pkg parser so it doesn't grab discs in the hdd
- GyroDSU working at last.
- Steam Shortcut path bulk update
- Fix DOSBox-pure config directory
- Fix Vita3K Launcher
- Fix EmuDeck Compressor tool with rvz files
- EasyRPG SRM parser
- Recursive SRM parsers are back
- Added ESDE 2.0 beta
- CSO Format support for PPSSPP
